Title: Wildfire
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Glen Mazzara
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Jon Bernthal, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden
Plot: After the attack on the camp, Rick leads the survivors to the C.D.C., in the hope that they can cure an infected Jim.
